headline: Why Procter & Gamble (PG) is a Cornerstone of Recession-Proof Dividend Portfolios
summary: The Procter & Gamble Company (NYSE:PG) is included among the 10 Best Recession Proof Dividend Stocks to Buy. The Procter & Gamble Company (NYSE:PG), founded in 1837, has grown into one of the world’s leading producers of household and personal care products, including detergents, diapers, baby wipes, paper towels, shampoos, deodorants, toothpaste, and cleaning supplies. […]

headline: Iconic Laundry Care Brand, Bounce, Unveils New Bounce Intense Dryer Sheets With Freshness That Lasts For Up To Four Weeks
summary: CINCINNATI, September 29, 2025--Bounce, the leading dryer sheet brand from Procter & Gamble, is resetting laundry expectations with the introduction of Bounce Intense, a multi-benefit dryer sheet engineered to deliver 10x the freshness of a leading base dryer sheet*. Launched in September 2025, Bounce Intense not only offers the static and wrinkle control that is a hallmark of the brand, but also provides the ultimate fresh experience that bursts from the dryer and lasts through wear for up to f
